entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: A teacher or coach at Hogwarts who is enthusiastic about Quidditch.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: Charlie Weasley's name is mentioned as a comparison to Harry's Quidditch skills.

entities.name: england
entities.description: A country where Charlie Weasley could have played Quidditch if he hadn't gone off chasing dragons.

entities.name: harry potter cup
entities.description: The name of the Quidditch Cup that Wood is confident Harry's team will win.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Harry's home address before he moved to Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Wood is teaching Harry how to play Quidditch.
Harry's Quidditch skills are compared to Charlie Weasley's.
Wood mentions that Charlie Weasley could have played for England if he hadn't gone off chasing dragons.
Harry's home address before he moved to Hogwarts.
Wood is confident that Harry's team will win the Quidditch Cup this year.
